testcase.name: Customer place an order by purchasing an item from search
testcase.system-out: Given user is on Home Page..................................................passed When he search for "dress"..................................................passed And choose to buy the first item............................................passed And moves to checkout from mini cart........................................passed And enter "Lakshay" personal details on checkout page.......................passed And select same delivery address............................................passed And select payment method as "check" payment................................passed And place the order.........................................................passed Then verify the order details...............................................passed
